name: Dunk A Lot - Tournaments
description:
This special edition of Dunk A Lot is powered by the Skillz platform

Compete for free with virtual currency or play for REAL CASH PRIZES!

Win real money in live 1v1 matches against other players from across the globe!

Do you have the skillz for it? ;)

Notes:
-Cash tournaments are not available in all regions. If you don't live in a cash-enabled region, you can still enjoy the game with virtual currency.
-If you have any questions about the Skillz system or cash tournaments please contact: support@skillz.com
